template.name: Assignments
Institutes
Candidates

li.span: Download the Excel sheet using the "Download Marksheet" button
Fill the marks and save the excel file in you computer
Navigate back to this same page and use the "Upload Marksheet" button to upload the marks
To edit the marks use the "Edit" button and click on "Confirm" button to lock in the marks

ol.li: Request candidate to login into the portal www.bestrust.in
Confirm the attendance of each candidate to generate the token
Provide the token to designated candidate to commence the exam

div.p: To Commence Exam please Contact BES

tr.th:
Climb the mast with safe practices ,
Prepare and throw Heaving Line,
Rigging Bosun's Chair and self lower and hoist

Rig a stage for painting shipside
Rig a Pilot Ladder
Rig scaffolding to work at a height

Recognise buyos and flags
.Hoisting a Flag correctly
.Steering and Helm Orders

Making fast Ropes and Wires
·Use Rope-Stopper / Chain Stopper
Knots, Bends, Hitches
.Whippings/Seizing/Splicing Ropes/Wires
Taking Soundings with sounding rod / sounding taps
·Reading of Draft
.Mannual lifting of weight

Uses of Hand/Plumbing/Carpentry Tools
Chipping Tools
Brushes & Paints

Use of Chipping Tools & paint Brushes
Use of Carpentry Tools
Use of Measuring Instruments
